description: The Federal Security Service of Russia, along with military commandant's office and Russian National Guard units, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone in the Novoazovsky region of the DPR. The drone was safely landed, and explosives experts neutralized the 7kg warhead and destroyed the charge on site.
original:

description: Anna Stavitskaya, head of the administration of the Central City district of Gorlovka, held a personal reception of citizens on Monday, February 19. The reception addressed concerns about heating and payment recalculations, with Anna providing explanations in accordance with current regulations and legal acts.
original:
Results of the personal reception of citizens by Anna Stavitskaya, head of the administration of the Central City district of Gorlovka

On Monday, February 19, a personal reception of citizens took place by the head of the administration of the Central City District of the city of Gorlovka, Anna Stavitskaya.

For a comprehensive consideration of applications, the head of the general department of the administration of the Central City District of Gorlovka, Svetlana Revuk, and the chief specialist of the housing and communal services department of the administration of the Central City District of Gorlovka, Tatyana Demenko, took part in the reception.

During the reception, questions were received about the lack of heating and the procedure for recalculating payment for heating.

On questions received, Anna Anatolyevna provided appropriate explanations in accordance with current regulations and legal acts.

Let us remind you that the reception of citizens by the head of the administration of the Central City district of Gorlovka is held every Monday from 11.00 to 13.00 in the administration building of the city of Gorlovka.

event: Presentation of Father of a Soldier Medals
description: Denis Miroshnichenko, Chairman of the People's Council of the LPR, presented the Father of a Soldier medals to three fathers of SVO participants in a solemn ceremony in Lugansk. He emphasized the importance of preserving the principle of continuity of generations when raising children and the role of fathers in shaping real men who stand up for their native land.
original:
Denis Miroshnichenko presented the Father of a Soldier medals to the fathers of the SVO participants
On February 19 in Lugansk, the Chairman of the People's Council of the LPR, Denis Miroshnichenko, in a solemn ceremony presented the three fathers of the SVO participants with public recognition medals “Father of a Soldier” of the All-Russian movement “Fathers of Russia”.
Show more
In his welcoming speech, the head of the legislative body noted the importance of preserving the principle of continuity of generations when raising children.
“The victory in the Great Patriotic War, the restoration of cities in the post-war period, the Afghan operation - this is all our history, which would have been impossible without real men. A man is a stronghold of the Fatherland. The very word “fatherland” is inextricably linked with fatherhood. It is important that in our society fathers continue to raise real men who are not afraid to stand up for their native land. It’s worth a lot,” Denis Miroshnichenko is sure.
Also read us on Telegram: https://t.me/parlamentLNR

event: Ukraine-Japan Economic Development and Reconstruction Conference
description: Ukraine and Japan signed 56 documents at the conference, focusing on economic development and reconstruction. The agreements covered cooperation in education, technology, reconstruction support, taxation, energy, telecommunications, construction, and ecology. The Prime Minister of Ukraine emphasized Japan's leadership in financial support and encouraged further investment in Ukraine's economy.
original: Ukraine and Japan signed 56 documents at the conference on economic development and reconstruction. Among them, in particular, a memorandum on cooperation in the field of education and technology, agreements on supporting the reconstruction of Ukraine, a convention on the avoidance of double taxation, as well as a number of documents in the field of energy, telecommunications, construction and of ecology. "Japan has already shown leadership in financial support to Ukraine. Now Japan must become one of the leaders of Ukrainian recovery and investment in our economy," wrote the Prime Minister of Ukraine.

description: In December 2023, Ukrainian defenders captured two militants, residents of Crimea, who had joined the Russian Armed Forces in 2022. The militants were part of the 1152nd Motorized Rifle Regiment and were involved in setting up fortifications and manning checkpoints in Berdyansk. They were sent to storm the positions of the Armed Forces in the Robotyny district but were captured during an assault.
original:
Forwarded from: Security Service of Ukraine
The SBU reported the suspicion of another 2 militants who tried to break through the positions of the Armed Forces of the Soviet Union near Robotyn.

In December 2023, Ukrainian defenders captured both attackers during fierce fighting in the Robotyny district of Zaporizhzhia.

Both detainees are residents of Crimea who voluntarily joined the 1152nd Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 47th Motorized Rifle Division of the Southern Military District of the Russian Armed Forces in the fall of 2022.

While in the ranks of the occupying group, one of the participants was appointed as a shooter, the other as a deputy platoon commander.

After training at a training ground in Russia in October-November 2022, the militants were transferred to the temporarily occupied Berdyansk.

There they set up fortifications around the city and along the perimeter of the captured airport. They were also on duty at enemy checkpoints.

Subsequently, both traitors were sent to the Robotyny district to storm the positions of the Armed Forces.

However, the Russians did not succeed in this - during one of the assaults, both militants were captured by soldiers of the Defense Forces.

Currently, the investigators of the Security Service have notified both detainees of suspicion under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: 2 Art. 111 (treason); ▪️⁠ Part 7 of Art. 111-1 (collaborative activity).

Regarding one of them, the pre-trial investigation has been completed, the indictment has been sent to the court

Enemy accomplices face life imprisonment.

The investigation was conducted by SBU employees in the Poltava region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office.

description: The SBU and NABU exposed a large-scale corruption scheme involving the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council. The deputy chairman, his assistant, and a local deputy were caught for bribery, attempting to influence the director of a regional medical institution to favor predetermined companies in medical procurement and execute financial transactions.
original:
The SBU and NABU exposed the deputy chairman of the Zaporizhia Regional Council and his accomplices for bribery. The Security Service, together with the NABU, eliminated a large-scale corruption scheme in which the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council was involved.

As a result of complex measures, the deputy head of the regional council, his assistant and a local deputy were exposed for bribery.

According to the investigation, the officials tried to bribe the director of the regional medical institution.

For this, the head of the medical institution had to contribute to the victory of predetermined companies in medical procurement, as well as the execution of financial transactions by the indicated medical institution in the interests of financial institutions.

The law enforcement officers exposed all three officials of the regional council "in the heat of the moment", immediately after they handed over the entire amount of illegal profit.

Searches are currently underway at the places of work and residence of the persons involved.

Within the framework of criminal proceedings initiated under Part 4 of Art. 369 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (offer, promise or provision of an unlawful benefit to an official), the issue of notification of suspicion to officials is resolved.

An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime. Perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison, with confiscation of property.

Comprehensive measures were conducted under the procedural guidance of the Specialized Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office of the Prosecutor General's Office.

event: Miracle of Icon Filling with Myrrh
description: During the liberation of Avdeevka, an icon of St. George the Victorious was filled with myrrh. This miraculous event occurred when priests, returning from the front line, stopped at a temple in Lisichansk. Initially, they thought someone had kissed the icon, but the wet marks reappeared, coinciding with the hours when Russian soldiers were liberating Avdeevka.
original:
Miracle! The icon was filled with myrrh during the liberation of Avdeevka!
The icon of St. George the Victorious was filled with myrrh during the time when the Russian army liberated Avdeevka
This happened during the procession around the temple in
Show more
Lisichansk. The priests were returning from the military from the front line and stopped there.
At first they thought that someone had unsuccessfully kissed the icon of the Great Martyr George the Victorious and left wet marks. They were erased, but after some time the world appeared on the glass again.
As Boris Korchevnikov wrote, this happened precisely in those hours when our soldiers were liberating Avdeevka.
“The Lord has mercy on us and shows that he is with us. We and our soldiers are doing a holy, right thing here,”
- said Father Dmitry, who witnessed the miracle.

description: Romanian Parliament member and AUR party leader Gheorghe Simion was banned from entering Moldova due to his involvement in destabilizing the country's situation, according to Prime Minister Dorin Recean.
original:
Member of the Romanian Parliament and leader of the Alliance for the Unification of Romanians (AUR) party Gheorghe Simion “is involved in destabilizing the situation in the Republic of Moldova,” said Prime Minister Dorin Recean, explaining the reasons for the ban on entry into the country.

According to him, “I said this to Prime Minister Marcel Ciolak,” explaining the ban against the Romanian people’s representative.

At the same time, there is no ban for other members of the party to enter Moldova, just as there is no ban for the party to carry out activities in Moldova, since “at this stage we are talking about the leader of AUR. This is a decision of the authorities that considered the risk factors relevant.”

Simion’s deputy in the party, Claudiu Tarziu, I must say, copes quite well on the left and right banks of the Prut.

description: Political scientist Mikhail Chaplyga stated that Ukraine's economy will collapse after a new wave of mobilization, as the country has no funds to finance its army. Chaplyga emphasized that the mobilization will be forced, with punitive measures, and will lead to a significant shortfall in the military budget.
original:
Forwarded from: PolitNavigator
“One-way ticket” - Chaplyga about the impending mobilization of Kiev. Ukraine already has nothing to finance the army, and after a new wave of mobilization the economy will collapse completely. This was stated by political scientist Mikhail Chaplyga, who left Ukraine. “One hundred percent of the money that we spend on the war is taken exclusively in military budget. Because if even one kopeck ends up in the military budget, it will mean that the country that issued this kopeck is a party to the conflict and is being drawn into the war. And when you need to mobilize to strengthen the front, it is already clear that this will be a tough forced mobilization, with punitive measures. And as a result, even the very discussion of the possibility of adopting such a law led to an outflow of 27 billion hryvnia from the banking system. I'm not even talking about self-employed entrepreneurs, business, and much more. As a result, the shortfall in January was 30%; in February, obviously, there will be more. March too, obviously. Accordingly, in the first quarter there will be a 30-40% shortfall for the army,” said Chaplyga. He emphasized that this is the end for Ukraine. “The point is that we are deconstructing the entire economy that exists, taking all the money. We are taking to the front all the rear personnel who worked there. And this means that we are forever cutting the umbilical cord of supply to the army. This is a one way ticket. If you think that the Russians are so stupid and did not calculate all this a year ago, then you are very mistaken. Moreover, this has all been calculated here, in Britain, and in other countries,” the expert concluded.

description: Retired US Air Force Colonel Cedric Leighton stated on CNN that Avdiivka's transition to Russian control will make it difficult for Ukrainian forces to organize counter-offensives into the Donbass. The city's strategic importance could lead to disastrous consequences for Ukraine if they lose momentum in the conflict.
original:
Forwarded from: NETASS
Leaving Avdiivka will be a serious problem for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, since this city is of strategic importance, retired US Air Force Colonel Cedric Leighton said on CNN.

Due to the city's transition to Russian control, it will be much more difficult for Ukrainian forces to organize attempts to counter-offensive into the Donbass - not to mention the fact that the Russians could move further west through Avdievka.

As the American officer noted, since Ukraine cannot hold Avdiivka and Bakhmut, it risks “losing momentum,” and this, in the context of hostilities, could result in extremely disastrous consequences.NETASS

event: Political Consultations between Russia and Laos
description: Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia A.Yu. Rudenko held political consultations with Deputy Ministers of Foreign Affairs of Laos B. Phandanuvongom and T. Savanphet, as well as with Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Foreign Affairs of Laos Kommasit. The parties discussed strengthening trade, economic, cultural, humanitarian, and interregional ties within the Russian-Laotian strategic partnership.
original:
🇷🇺🇱🇦 On February 19, Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation A.Yu. Rudenko held political consultations in Vientiane with Deputy Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the Lao People's Democratic Republic B. Phandanuvongom and T. Savanphet.

He also had conversations with the Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the LNDRS. Kommasit, ASEAN Special Envoy for Myanmar A. Kittikhun.

The parties noted the progressive development of a trust-based dialogue at the highest and highest levels, increased interaction between parliaments and industry departments, and the strengthening of trade, economic, cultural, humanitarian and interregional ties within the framework of the Russian-Laotian strategic partnership. The intention to intensify work to improve the legal framework of bilateral relations was emphasized. The coincidence or similarity of the approaches of Russia and Laos on key issues on the international agenda was confirmed. A “synchronization of watches” was carried out on current regional issues in the context of the current chairmanship of Laos in the Association of Southeast Asian Nations. Particular attention is paid to the prospects for strengthening the dialogue strategic partnership#RussiaASEAN, interaction between the two countries in ASEAN-centric mechanisms, as well as issues of resolving the situation in Myanmar.#RussiaLaos

description: Chicago City Hall plans to abandon the ShotSpotter AI crime suppression system due to allegations of racism. The AI was accused of sending police squads mainly to African and Latin American neighborhoods, threatening the bond of American multinationality.
original:
Chicago City Hall plans to abandon crime suppression AI due to the latter's "racism" - GuardianPolice in some American cities are using artificial intelligence to prevent and suppress crime. Among the solutions available on the market is the system from ShotSpotter (Sound Thinking).

Chicago security forces used the company's solution, based on a system of microphones located in the city, to suppress the use of weapons and spoke highly of it. However, everything changed after the Associated Press published an investigation in which it accused artificial intelligence of racism. The fact is that AI neurons sent police squads mainly to African and Latin American neighborhoods.

It goes without saying that such decisions from AI threatened the bond of American multinationality, and the Chicago mayor's office decided to abandon ShotSpotter AI, despite the objections of the police.

Now the city administration is frantically looking for a more “inclusive” replacement, and, as usual, they are not concerned about the possible risks of an increase in crimes with the use of firearms in the city.

event: Discussion on Tactical Electronic Warfare Aircraft
description: A discussion on creating a Russian tactical electronic warfare aircraft, potentially based on the Su-30 platform, with the option to use Chinese-made components. The aircraft would need to be a front-line, two-seater vehicle, capable of operating with other attack vehicles.
original:
On the topic of the post about tactical electronic warfare aircraft

Growler, already a classic, and Chinese versions of electronic warfare aircraft based on their version of the Su-27

Our aircraft could be made on the basis of the Su-30, using its platform as a basis, and saturate it with the necessary electronics. Alternatively, to speed up the creation of the machine, it may be possible to use some Chinese-made components.

The air platform is not necessarily the most modern; the Su-30 is optimal in this regard, a mass production vehicle. But it is precisely a front-line aircraft that is needed so that it can operate together with other attack vehicles. Therefore, civil aircraft are not suitable as a basis.

It is not very rational to resaw aircraft from storage for this task, since two-seater aircraft are needed, and the time and costs of reworking will be comparable to building a new one. Which will last much longer.

Well, to begin with, it is necessary for the decision maker to understand that such a machine is generally needed, and that the enemy is not a fool for using such a class of military equipment. And half measures and a universal solution will always lose to a specialized tool. Especially which is used as a system component of the complex, which is very difficult to resist. Russian Engineer -✅subscribe

description: Military personnel built an underground apartment at a temporary deployment point, complete with a bathhouse for relaxation. The cozy, clean, and spacious space took a month and a half to construct, with time spent digging and laying concrete slabs. Up to seven people can live in the apartment, which was made more comfortable with donated sleeping bags, generators, and stoves.
original:
DIY underground apartment! Military personnel spoke about relaxation with a bathhouse at temporary deployment points
A serviceman with the call sign "Saint" showed the Popular Front a field apartment. At first glance, you won’t understand that all this is underground. The apartment was equipped in just a month and a half. More
Show more
All the time was spent digging a hole and laying concrete slabs.
Contrary to stereotypes, the fighters' place is very cozy, clean and spacious. In fact, at temporary deployment points, military personnel build bathhouses where you can swim, wash and wash things:
“People often ask why we are so clean if we live underground,” shared “The Saint.”
Up to seven people can live in such an apartment at once. More is already dangerous, because during a missile alert it is impossible to “huddle” in one place.
To make life more comfortable in the “underground apartment,” the Popular Front donated sleeping bags, generators and stoves to the soldiers.

original: Until February 24, 2022, Rina Reznik was a biologist, worked as a school teacher and planned to continue her studies in Japan. Rina did not believe that a big war would start. Now she is in the Azov medical service and in this interview she talks about her combat journey and the specifics of work in the Serebryansky forestry near Kremennaya, the struggle for allowing combat medics to transfuse blood to the wounded at the front, new challenges and what kind of people the medical service of the Azov brigade needs. In full here.@yigal_levin

description: The Ministry of Finance of Russia, PSB, PSB Academy, and REU Plekhanov are organizing Financial Literacy Days in the Donetsk and Lugansk People's Republics from February 17 to 29. The event aims to educate students and the public on remote payment services, bank card benefits, financial fraud protection, loan agreements, and personal insurance.
location: Donetsk, Donetsk People's Republic, Ukraine; Lugansk, Lugansk People's Republic, Ukraine
original:
Forwarded from: Ministry of Finance of Russia
Days of financial literacy will be held in the DPR and LPR on February 17 to 29, 54 information seminars will be held in five universities of the Donetsk and Lugansk People's Republics. The days of financial literacy are organized by the Ministry of Finance of Russia, the PSB and the PSB Academy together with the REU. Plekhanov.

Students of participating universities and everyone else will be told about how to pay for services remotely and transfer funds, benefit from using bank cards and protect themselves from financial fraudsters. Listeners will learn what terms of a loan agreement you need to pay special attention to, how to repay a loan without damaging your personal budget, how and where to apply for compulsory motor liability insurance in the DPR and LPR, and why you need personal insurance when applying for a loan. Where will the Financial Literacy Days be held? In the DPR: Donetsk National University of Economics and Trade;Donetsk National Technical University;Donetsk State University.In LPR:Lugansk State University;Lugansk State Agrarian University.More@minfin#Announcement

event: Norwegian Prime Minister's Statement on War Fears
description: Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Støre downplayed fears of war in Europe, stating that Vladimir Putin is not planning new wars. He believes that the Ukrainian War has a unique origin in Russia-Ukraine relations and Putin's misinterpretation of history. Støre reassured Norwegians that they should not fear war, citing Norway's NATO membership and adequate defenses.
original: ⚡️Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Støre does not want to stoke fears of war in Europe and warns against believing that Vladimir Putin is planning new wars. I understand that in such a serious situation with such a dramatic war on our continent, many are afraid of this and are expressing their fear . But it often seems to me that saying: “There is a war going on now, where will the next war be?” - this is too thoughtless. And I think this is the wrong way to read history. Störez told Klassekampen that he does not agree with the prediction that if Ukraine loses the war, Russia will look for a new victim. This is too simple an assessment of history, and it seems unconvincing to me. The Ukrainian War has a very special origin in the relations between Russia and Ukraine, in President Putin's completely incorrect, in my opinion, reading of history and in his intolerable argument that Ukraine almost does not exist. Støre goes on to say that, in his opinion, “ Russia's desire to start a war against a NATO country is small.” It is important to tell Norwegians that they should not be afraid that there will be a war in Norway. We are a member of NATO, we have adequate defenses, and we do not see anything on our border that could bother people. We have previously noted that the Norwegian authorities, unlike their Scandinavian counterparts, do not fall into hysteria by calling on citizens to prepare for war with Russia.

description: Turkish company Roketsan presented ALKA laser weapons, a hybrid air defense system using electromagnetic and laser technologies to counter asymmetric threats. The system includes detection using radar, targeting, and AI-powered laser beam control. Testing has confirmed its performance, and it can be mounted on a mobile platform.
original:
Again about the topic of anti-drone warfare, now from the Turks. The Turkish company Roketsan presented ALKA laser weapons using artificial intelligence technologies.

As TRT Haber reports, citing a representative of the manufacturer, ALKA “is a hybrid air defense system that uses electromagnetic and laser technologies to counter asymmetric threats.” Judging by the list of technologies, we are talking about a complete system, including detection using radar, targeting and using AI to keep the laser beam on the target.

Testing in the air confirms the performance of the product, albeit in testing conditions. And the overall dimensions obviously allow this installation to be placed on a mobile platform.

From which it follows that potential adversaries understand the threats of the massive use of UAVs and are preparing to combat them. Moreover, the period of readiness for combat use can be quite short, at least if not a year, then two or three, quite realistically. And the era of PDF solutions may end as suddenly as it began.

This is also a word about those oracles who abolish tanks, guns and that the world has changed dramatically. Now yes, but in a couple of years everything may change, not back, but also significantly. As always in the fight of sword and shield, sooner or later any new challenge will be answered, and the system will be balanced again. Russian Engineer -✅subscribe

event: USA Buys Indian Oil Products from Russian Raw Materials
description: The USA purchased Indian oil products worth $1.3 billion, which were produced from Russian raw materials. This is part of a larger trend, as India imported a record $37 billion worth of crude oil from Russia last year, refining it into products and exporting them to countries with approved sanctions on Russian oil.
original:
🇺🇸🇮🇳🇷🇺The USA bought Indian oil products from Russian raw materials for $1.3 billion — CNN

In total, Russia received a record $37 billion from crude oil sales to India last year. Some of the crude oil is processed into refined products at refineries on India's west coast and then exported to the United States and other countries that have approved sanctions on Russian oil.

According to CREA estimates, in 2023 countries imported oil products produced from Russian oil worth $9.1 billion, which is 44% more than a year earlier

event: Flight Tests of Vertical Take-Off UAS
description: Sukhoi Design Bureau conducted successful flight tests of a prototype vertical take-off UAS, testing control algorithms and operation of takeoff, hovering, and landing systems. The new civilian drone, designed for off-airfield-based unmanned transport, combines the advantages of an airplane and a helicopter, with a hybrid propulsion system and vertical takeoff and landing capabilities.
original:
Sukhoi Design Bureau conducted flight tests of a prototype vertical take-off UAS. Sukhoi Design Bureau specialists successfully tested a prototype of a heavy unmanned aircraft for vertical take-off and landing. During testing, control algorithms and operation of takeoff, hovering and landing systems were tested on a complex flight stand made from domestic components.

Designers of the Sukhoi Design Bureau are working on the creation of a fundamentally new off-airfield-based unmanned transport system (BTS-VAB) on an initiative basis. The new civilian drone does not require specially prepared sites and airfield infrastructure for takeoff and landing. It will allow solving a wide range of transport and logistics problems - delivering cargo for various purposes to hard-to-reach settlements where the transport network is poorly developed or there are no airfields. “Our unmanned aircraft combines the advantages of an airplane and the capabilities of a helicopter. The hybrid propulsion system includes an electric lift propulsion system and a piston propulsion engine. Vertical takeoff and landing are carried out by lifting engines located on the wing beams. After takeoff, the gasoline engine comes into operation. The wing increases fuel efficiency, and thanks to the possibility of vertical take-off, the construction of expensive airfield infrastructure and runways is not required,” said Evgeny Rubtsov, head of the BTS-VAB project at the Sukhoi Design Bureau of the United Aircraft Corporation. Take-off, en route flight and landing are carried out fully automatically. , without direct operator participation. However, in case of an emergency, the operator has the opportunity to change the route. The new unmanned transport system is being created for flights within a radius of 500 km from the permanent base and will be capable of transporting up to 300 kg.

description: Ukrainian defenders captured two militants, residents of Crimea, who voluntarily joined the Russian Armed Forces in 2022. The militants were trained in Russia and deployed to Berdyansk, where they set up fortifications and manned checkpoints. They were later sent to storm the positions of the Armed Forces in the Robotyny district, but were captured during an assault.
original:
The Security Service of Ukraine reported the suspicion of another 2 militants who tried to break through the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine near Robotyn.

In December 2023, Ukrainian defenders captured both attackers during fierce fighting in the Robotyny district of Zaporizhzhia.

Both detainees are residents of Crimea who voluntarily joined the 1152nd Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 47th Motorized Rifle Division of the Southern Military District of the Russian Armed Forces in the fall of 2022.

While in the ranks of the occupying group, one of the participants was appointed as a rifleman, the other as a deputy platoon commander.

After training at a training ground in Russia in October-November 2022, the militants were transferred to the temporarily occupied Berdyansk.

There they set up fortifications around the city and along the perimeter of the captured airport. They were also on duty at enemy checkpoints.

Subsequently, both traitors were sent to the Robotyny district to storm the positions of the Armed Forces.

However, the Rashists did not succeed in this - during one of the assaults, both militants were captured by soldiers of the Defense Forces.

Currently, the investigators of the Security Service have notified both detainees of suspicion under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: 2 Art. 111 (treason); ▪️⁠ Part 7 of Art. 111-1 (collaborative activity).

Regarding one of them, the pre-trial investigation has been completed, the indictment has been sent to the court

Enemy accomplices face life imprisonment.

The investigation was conducted by SBU employees in the Poltava region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office.

description: On February 19, Russian forces shelled the city of Vovchansk, hitting a civilian enterprise and damaging buildings and a car. Two guards, aged 37 and 36, were injured and hospitalized. The attack is being investigated as a violation of the laws and customs of war.

🔷The investigative-prosecutor group is working at the site of an enemy attack on Vovchansk, during which two people were injured🖌️Under the procedural leadership of the Vovchansk Department of the Chuguyiv District Prosecutor's Office of the Kharkiv Region, a pre-trial investigation has been launched into the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine ).

According to the investigation, on February 19, around 9:45 a.m., the occupiers once again shelled the city of Vovchansk. A hit to the territory of a civilian enterprise was recorded, buildings and a car were damaged.

Two men aged 37 and 36 were injured. Both are guards of the enterprise. At present, the victims have been hospitalized.

Prosecutors and police investigators take all possible and appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by representatives of the Russian Armed Forces. ⚔️Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office

These tough nuts, 60-70 years old, caused a rustle in post offices, leaving behind only a whirlwind of gray hair and the smell of validol.

description: The FSB announced the neutralization of Vitaly Dyatlenko, a Russian national allegedly recruited by the SBU to prepare a terrorist attack against a Zaporozhye politician before the elections. Dyatlenko, pretending to be disabled, planted a bomb under his car and offered armed resistance when arrested, leading to his neutralization.
original:
The FSB announced the murder of a “Ukrainian agent” who was allegedly preparing a terrorist attack against a Zaporozhye politician. According to the FSB, Russian Vitaly Dyatlenko was recruited by the SBU and was preparing a terrorist attack against one of the politicians in the Zaporozhye region before the elections. It is alleged that Dyatlenko, pretending to be disabled, planted a bomb under his car. “When trying to arrest Vitaly Dyatlenko, he offered armed resistance to the security officers and was neutralized by retaliatory actions. There were no casualties among the civilian population or law enforcement officers,” the FSB said in a statement.

The agency reports that at the scene of the incident, security forces found a Makarov pistol, ammunition and spent cartridges.

description: The Verkhovna Rada may consider the mobilization bill in its second reading this week, despite ongoing controversies. Key issues include demobilization of conscripts, rights of persons with disabilities, delays for university teachers, and demobilization and rotation.
original:
The Verkhovna Rada may consider the bill on mobilization in the second reading as early as this week - TsymbalyukDespite the fact that there are still controversial issues, “there is every chance” to vote on the bill in the second reading as a whole, says the first deputy head of the committee on social policy and protection of veterans’ rights .

According to Tsymbalyuk, the following questions will become controversial: 🔹demobilization of conscripts: “We demand that they be demobilized immediately, within 2 months”; 🔹questions regarding persons with disabilities: “A person with a disability has the right to determine who will look after him and this should be only one person";🔹delays for university teachers;🔹demobilization and rotation (demobilization after 36 months is too long, the people’s deputy believes).

As you know, martial law and mobilization in Ukraine have been extended for another 90 days. Subscribe /Eng Twitter/YouTube /Eng Telegram

event: Geert Wilders' Criticism of Ukraine Support
description: Dutch politician Geert Wilders, leader of the far-right Freedom Party, criticized the Netherlands' support for Ukraine, stating that Ukrainian refugees come to the Netherlands for free housing and medicine, not to escape hostilities. He also believes that the authorities should not supply Kyiv while they are unable to defend their country.
original: A Dutch politician called his country “idiotic” for accepting Ukrainian refugees. This was stated by the leader of the recently victorious far-right Freedom Party, Geert Wilders: in his opinion, Ukrainian refugees come to the Netherlands not to escape hostilities, but to get free housing and medicine. Previously, Wilders had already criticized the Netherlands’ support for Ukraine: in his opinion, the authorities should not supply Kyiv while they are “not able to defend their country.” Given that the Freedom Party now has a significant advantage in the Dutch parliament, we can expect that Wilders will take advantage of the situation and cut supplies to Ukraine.

description: On the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, activists from the Young Guard of United Russia and the Volunteer Company wrote letters to participants in the Special Military Operation, expressing gratitude and support for their selfless defense of the Fatherland.

Pride and faith in every line
On the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, activists of the Young Guard of United Russia and the Volunteer Company wrote letters addressed to the defenders of their native land - participants in the Special Military Operation. Soon messages filled with sincere gratitude and
Show more
support, they will be transferred to the front.
Participants in the Special Military Operation, as the organizers of the action noted, selflessly defend the borders of the Fatherland, protect the lives of ordinary people at the cost of their own fate. The support of compatriots who wholeheartedly believe in victory is important for everyone.

event: Erosion of Shore near Mass Grave
description: The sea is eroding the shore in the village of Geroevskoye, threatening to engulf the Mass Grave of Red Army soldiers. The commander of the Kerch detachment of the Crimean Rubezh PA of DOSAAF of Russia, Viktor Gustoy, warns that the sea is approaching the monument, with only two meters left, and that urgent measures are needed to strengthen the bank to prevent irreversible damage.
original:
The sea in the village of Geroevskoye continues to erode the shore, moving closer and closer to the Mass Grave every hour. This was announced by the commander of the Kerch detachment of the Crimean Rubezh PA of DOSAAF of Russia Viktor Gustoy.

Where there was a shore two and a half months ago, the sea took away several meters, revealing the burial place of Red Army soldiers.

“The sea is approaching the Mass Grave, there are almost two meters left to the monument. One or two storms and there will be irreversible problems, everything will crumble right before our eyes. There is an urgent need to strengthen the bank,” says Gustoy.

event: Government Support for SVO Participants and Veterans
description: The Russian government allocated over 18 billion rubles to the Defenders of the Fatherland Foundation to support veterans of the special military operation and families of fallen soldiers. The government also clarified rules for assigning a single child benefit to volunteer families, and Rosgvardiya volunteers will receive a uniform combat veteran certificate, confirming their status and right to social benefits.
original: The Government discussed issues of state support for SVO participants and veterans. Main thing:✔️The government allocated more than 18 billion rubles to the Defenders of the Fatherland Foundation. The funds will be used to fulfill the tasks assigned to the fund, the main of which is comprehensive support for veterans of a special military operation and family members of fallen soldiers.✔️Head of the Cabinet Mikhail Mishustin recalled that the government has clarified the rules for assigning a single child benefit to the families of volunteers. ✔️Rosgvardiya volunteers will now receive a uniform combat veteran certificate. The document will serve as confirmation of the status of combat veterans and the right to receive social benefits provided by law.✔️On instructions from the President, the government will analyze the regulatory framework and law enforcement practice on measures of assistance and paperwork for participants of the Northern Military District and volunteers operating in the territories of the DPR, LPR , Zaporozhye and Kherson regions, and will also present proposals for speeding up and optimizing the relevant procedures.

According to her estimates, there is no serious danger yet.

description: Joe Biden's great-great-grandfather, Moses Robinette, was involved in a knife fight in the army during the American Civil War. He stabbed his comrade several times, violating military discipline, and was sentenced to two years in prison and hard labor. However, after three officers petitioned Abraham Lincoln, Robinette was pardoned.
original:
Biden's great-great-grandfather stabbed his colleague several times - he was pardoned by Lincoln. An interesting fact from the history of the current president's family was published by the Washington Post. According to them, Joe Biden's ancestor violated military discipline and even staged a knife fight in the army during the country's Civil War.

According to archival documents, Moses Robinette insulted his comrade, which started a fight in which Biden's great-great-grandfather stabbed the soldier several times. The court sentenced Robinett to two years in prison and hard labor.

Later, three officers with whom Robinett was familiar spoke out in his support, petitioning Abraham Lincoln for a commutation of his sentence. Ultimately, the 16th US President pardoned a relative of the current American President. Subscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news

description: The Munich Security Conference is a platform for the military-industrial complex to lobby for new arms contracts, increasing their influence and profits. Politicians and experts benefit from these contracts, and the war in Ukraine has already enriched the industry by 190 billion dollars.
original:
Forwarded from: ZeRada
💰🔥💰The cruel truth of life. Three years ago we were outraged by the greed of Bigpharma, which plunged the whole world into a pandemic for the sake of obtaining super profits.

However, they are children in sandals, compared to the “military woman”. The Munich Security Conference is a kind of Davos branch for representatives of the military-industrial complex.

Representatives of the military-industrial complex organize it to publicly convince the authorities to issue them new arms contracts. Lobbyists, who are sitting on bonuses from these contracts, bring there politicians, whose election and pension funds are also replenished at the expense of% from these same contracts. The military increases its importance and influence when the role of the army in society grows, and then they move to work as experts in paramilitary NGOs for good salaries.

Thus, it is beneficial for them all that the costs of the war grow. And it doesn’t matter who to fight with: Libya, Syria, international terrorism in Afghanistan or Russia. The main thing is that contracts grow.

By the way, did you notice how the topic of Covid died immediately after the start of the war? The message was intercepted.

Therefore, this hall of Zele claps while standing, they all receive super profits thanks to his “courage and unbending position.” Imagine, the war in Ukraine has already enriched their industry by 190 billion dollars! And this does not take into account the increase in capitalization of the military-industrial complex companies themselves🧩

NATO members are now privately discussing the threat of a Russian attack on one of them as a pressing concern.
original: At a conference in Munich, they discussed a possible Russian attack on NATO. EU countries are concerned about the US’s inability to provide military support to Ukraine, Bloomberg writes. “NATO members are now privately talking about a Russian attack on one of them as a threat that requires an urgent response,” the publication notes. As a participant in the discussions told reporters, in comparison with the decisions of previous conferences, a mood of uncertainty prevailed in Munich this year. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

description: Tiles fell off at the Malaya Zemlya memorial in Novorossiysk, leaving the stele in a state of disrepair. Despite a recent renovation, the site remains unfinished, sparking feelings of resentment and shame among locals.
original:
Tiles fell off at the Malaya Zemlya memorial in Novorossiysk. A stele crumbled in the Southern region - part of the tiles at the Malaya Zemlya memorial are no longer there, but no one is reconstructing anything.

- I just came to the stele, you know, such a feeling of resentment, annoyance and shame. There are a lot of flowers - the Beskozyrka was recently held in Novorossiysk - and look at this horror, this shame of the stele itself. But last year there was a renovation, and it was supposed to be completed in August for City Day. Someone apparently cut down the money and didn’t finish anything, the woman complains. Source

description: An American delegation, including senators, arrived in Budapest to pressure Hungarian Prime Minister Orban on admitting Sweden to NATO. However, the Hungarian government refused to meet with them, citing a stance against external pressure. Orban emphasized that Hungary's interests come first.
original:
🇭🇺🇺🇸The arrival of the American delegation was ignored in Hungary – The New York Times

It is reported that American senators who flew to Budapest wanted to put pressure on Orban on the issue of admitting Sweden to NATO. “I am disappointed that no one from the government met with us while we were here,” Senator Jeanne Sheikhin said at a press conference on Sunday. .

Earlier, Orban said that Budapest does not intend to tolerate external pressure, including the NATO expansion plan. “Hungary comes first,” Orban said on Saturday at the end of his address to the nation.

The Americans called the Hungarian government's decision "concerning."

event: Humanitarian Crisis in LPR and DPR
description: Civilians in the LPR and DPR territories, under constant threat of shelling, face severe difficulties in accessing basic necessities like food, heat, gas, and electricity. Many homes are damaged or destroyed, forcing people to cook in basements and bomb shelters. The elderly and people with disabilities are particularly vulnerable. Humanitarian efforts are underway to provide food packages to those in need.
location: Luhansk, Luhansk Oblast, Ukraine; Donetsk, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine
original:
“The hardest thing in terms of food” are the words of ordinary civilians from the territories of the LPR and DPR, who have been under the threat of shelling for a long time.

Many people's homes were damaged or completely destroyed. Because of this, there are interruptions in heat, gas, and electricity. Some have to cook over fires in basements and bomb shelters. It's good if you have something to cook with. It is especially difficult for the elderly and people with disabilities to take care of themselves in such unstable conditions. You have to somehow survive despite all the difficulties.

Now there is an opportunity to support residents of the LPR and DPR who are in a difficult situation. Vegetables, fruits, soups, buckwheat porridge, cookies, bread, tea, sugar - this is part of what can be done to help people in war zones. Food packages are purchased, collected and sent especially for them. Food is delivered to problem areas and distributed to those in need.

To provide assistance, go to the website: help-dnr.ru A comfortable amount will help several, and possibly hundreds of people save themselves from hunger.

description: A new four-lane road is being constructed and reconstructed from the Rostov region border towards Mariupol in the DPR. The highway, likely to be named 'Novorossiya', will connect with the 'Tavrida' and M4 highways, forming the 'Azov ring' around the inland Russian sea.

The new highway to Crimea will most likely be called “Novorossiya” and will connect with the four-lane “Tavrida”, and in sections of the Krasnodar Territory with the M4 highway, thereby forming the so-called “Azov ring” around the inland Russian sea.👉Subscribe to Berdyansk.RelevantAlways up-to-date news !

description: A fire broke out in the village of Kiparisny, Alushta, affecting 4 private residential buildings. Despite being hampered by wind and dense buildings, the fire was localized and eventually extinguished. No harm was reported. The incident is under investigation by the prosecutor's office.
original:
The fire in Alushta was completely extinguished, the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Emergency Situations for the Republic of Crimea reports. At about 3 o'clock in the afternoon it was localized in an area of 350 square meters.

Let us remind you that today in the village of Kiparisny on Alushtinskaya Street 4 private residential buildings caught fire. No harm done. The fire was hampered by wind and dense buildings.

The incident is under the control of the prosecutor's office, the circumstances are being clarified. Photo: Main Directorate of the Ministry of Emergency Situations for the Republic of Crimea 24 |@tvcrimea24

description: In Kazakhstan, a group of Islamic radicals vandalized an Orthodox cemetery near Zhanaozen, breaking and tearing out crosses from graves. The act of vandalism has an anti-Christian orientation, leaving relatives of the deceased in shock. Local authorities and police have failed to take action, leaving the community fearful of further desecration.
original:
In Kazakhstan, vandals desecrated an Orthodox cemetery - a group of radicals broke and tore crosses from the graves, and the police and local authorities shrugged their shoulders. Near the city of Zhanaozen, which in Soviet times was called New Uzen, there remains a cemetery where exclusively Orthodox Christians are buried. This is what probably did not please the local Islamic radicals - they broke and tore out all the tombstone crosses, and later threw them in a pile. Relatives of the deceased are in shock after visiting the cemetery. The network has already noticed that the act of vandalism has an exclusively anti-Christian orientation, because the more “neutral” slabs were not damaged.

People are afraid that the desecration of graves will continue and ask to organize at least some kind of security or hang up a camera. They had already turned to the police and local authorities, but they only recorded the fact of the outrages and could not offer more help. Uncle Slava. Subscribe.

event: Meeting between Azerbaijani and Armenian Leaders
description: A meeting between the leaders of Azerbaijan and Armenia took place in a constructive atmosphere, with calls for normalization of relations, border delimitation, and a peace treaty. However, the Armenian Prime Minister's statements were misleading and regrettable, as they did not acknowledge the unfounded claims to Azerbaijani territories.
original: Press Secretary of the Azerbaijani Foreign Ministry Aykhan Hajizade, commenting on the statements of the Prime Minister of Armenia at a meeting with the Armenian community in Munich: Despite the fact that, at the initiative of the German Chancellor, the meeting between the leaders of Azerbaijan and Armenia took place in a constructive and useful atmosphere, despite calls for the normalization of Azerbaijani -Armenian relations, border delimitation and peace treaty, the statements of the Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan, misleading the international community, are regrettable. As for the Prime Minister’s opinion that “Karabakh’s right to self-determination is not supported by the international community,” as can be seen , the Prime Minister does not declare that claims to the territories of Azerbaijan are unfounded, but that actions that should be continued only because they are not supported by the international community are unreasonable. This once again indirectly proves that the claims of the Armenian side are still ongoing. In this regard, the claims to our territorial integrity and sovereignty reflected in the Constitution and legislative acts of Armenia must be eliminated. As for the assertion of the Armenian side that Azerbaijan allegedly violated the tripartite declaration, everyone knows that this has no basis, that it was Armenia, contrary to its obligations, that did not withdraw its armed forces from the territory of Azerbaijan and did not fulfill its obligation to open communications. The Armenian side must understand that the path to ensuring peace and stability in the region lies through establishing relations with neighboring countries on the basis of confirmation and respect for territorial integrity and sovereignty and direct constructive negotiations with Azerbaijan.@Caucasian_bureau

description: Ecuador has strengthened control over local banana suppliers following a scandal involving the detection of humpback flies in bananas. Measures include increased phytosanitary inspections, a special quarantine zone, integrated pest management, staff training, additional container cleaning, and labeling for traceability purposes.
original:
Flies in bananas are abolished: Ecuador informed Rosselkhoznadzor about strengthening control over local suppliers.

It is noted that after the scandal erupted in the South American country, they increased the number of phytosanitary inspections, and also built a special quarantine zone for loading bananas from plantations.

Fruit exporters were also required to carry out integrated pest management, staff training, additional container cleaning, and labeling for traceability purposes.

Earlier, Rosselkhoznadzor, concerned about the situation with the supply of bananas from Ecuador, in which the humpback fly was detected, asked the Minister of Agriculture and Livestock of the South American state to suspend the certification of five exporters of these fruits.Subscribe to REN TV

description: A rally was held on Capitol Hill in Rome to commemorate Alexei Navalny. Hundreds of people gathered, lighting candles and holding posters accusing Vladimir Putin of Navalny's murder.
location: Piazza del Campidoglio, Capitol Hill, Rome, Italy
original:
Hundreds of candles were lit on Capitol Hill in Rome in memory of Navalny. PhotoIn Rome, on the evening of February 19, a rally was held in memory of Alexei Navalny. Hundreds of candlelit people came to Piazza del Campidoglio, the central square of Capitol Hill.

Some participants held posters accusing Vladimir Putin of Navalny’s murder. Remembrance rallies have been taking place in European cities since February 16, when it became known about Navalny’s death.

description: Julian Assange, the founder of WikiLeaks, will face hearings in the High Court of London on February 20. If he fails to win the right to appeal against extradition, he will be sent to the United States, where he faces life imprisonment.
original: The story of Julian Assange may soon be put to rest: he will face hearings in the High Court of London, reports the Associated Press. Two days have been allocated for the court hearings in the Assange case, which will begin on February 20. If the WikiLeaks founder, who is accused of espionage, cannot win the right to appeal against extradition, he will be sent to the United States. There he faces life imprisonment. Every day while he remains in prison, his life is at risk. If he is extradited, he will die,” said Assange’s wife, lawyer Stella Morris. Earlier, the head of the British Home Office, Priti Patel, noted that British courts do not believe that Assange’s extradition would be a repressive, unfair measure, a violation of procedure or his personal rights.📮Subscribe nalomovka

event: BMPT Tank Support Combat Vehicles in Special Operation Zone
description: Tank support combat vehicles, specifically the BMPT, have demonstrated their effectiveness in the special operation zone. Equipped with two AGSs, two T-30 guns, four ATGMs, and a PKT machine gun, they are capable of engaging lightly armored vehicles, infantry, and tanks. The commander, call sign 'Zorik', praised the vehicle's reliability, stating it is combat-ready in any weather and time of day.
original:
In the special operation zone, tank support combat vehicles have proven themselves to be the best
“Works against lightly armored vehicles, infantry and tanks. The weapons here are two AGSs, two T-30 guns, four ATGMs, and a PKT machine gun,” he spoke about the advantages of the equipment.
Show more
BMPT commander with the call sign “Zorik”.
The serviceman emphasizes: “The car behaves well - there are no complaints. Combat-ready in any weather and time of day.”

description: Russian FSB employees in the Zaporozhye region foiled an assassination attempt on a regional official by neutralizing a Ukrainian special services agent. The agent, disguised as a disabled person, was caught on camera placing an IED under the target's car. A search of the agent's belongings revealed components for making explosive devices and military weapons.
original:
Employees of the Russian FSB in the Zaporozhye region neutralized an agent of the Ukrainian special services, who, on the orders of the SBU, was preparing an assassination attempt on one of the region’s officials.

The operational video footage shows how a man, disguised as a disabled person, places an IED under his target’s car.

During the searches, he was found to have components for making explosive devices, as well as military weapons. Petya the First. Subscribe

description: The GUR confirmed the death of Russian pilot Kuzminov, who had defected to Ukraine by flying a helicopter. He was found dead in Spain, where he had relocated. According to reports, he had invited his ex-girlfriend to his residence, where she was found shot dead. A burnt car, likely used by the killers, was discovered nearby.
original:
The GUR confirmed the death of the Russian pilot Kuzminov, who had earlier flown a Russian helicopter to Ukraine. "We can confirm the fact of death," said the representative of the GUR Andriy Yusov in a comment. "He decided to move to Spain instead of being here. From what we know: he invited his ex to his place and she was found shot dead", - GUR about the death of the pilot Kuzminov. Nearby they found a burnt car, which was probably used by the killers.

At the same time, the Spanish Civil Guard said that they could not confirm reports of the pilot's murder.

description: Crews of missile boats R-298, R-29, and R-18 of the Pacific Fleet demonstrated readiness to carry out combat missions at sea during the K-2 course task. They conducted artillery firing at sea and air targets, practiced firing at a floating mine, and used hand-held grenade launchers against conditional saboteurs. The exercise simulated a missile attack on a mock enemy ship, following the entire algorithm of actions except for the actual launch.
original:
The crews of the missile boats "R-298", "R-29" and "R-18" of the Pacific Fleet (PF) confirmed their readiness to carry out assigned combat missions at sea during the completion of the K-2 course task.

In the Sea of Japan, for several days, missile boats carried out preparatory and test artillery firing at sea and air targets.

The personnel of the missile boats also practiced firing at a floating mine and firing from a hand-held grenade launcher at detected conditional saboteurs.

During the exercise, the sailors worked out the tasks as intended, performing electronic launches on a mock enemy ship with a Mosquito missile. In this episode, the crews of the missile boats practiced the entire algorithm of actions when launching a missile attack, with the exception of the actual missile launch.

The events were carried out according to the combat training plan of the Pacific Fleet.

Press service of the Eastern Military District#r298#r29#r18#Pacificfleet#tof#coursework#missileboat#k2

description: The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, along with military commandant's office and National Guard units, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze drone in the Novoazovsky region. The drone, carrying 7 kg of explosives, was intended to target a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol. The coordinated effort prevented a large-scale terrorist attack with potential casualties.
original:
Forwarded from: Pushilin D.V.
The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, together with units of the military commandant's office and the National Guard in the Novoazovsky region of the Republic, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone. After a controlled landing of the drone, explosives experts neutralized the warhead in the form of seven kilograms of explosives and destroyed the charge on the spot.

As a result of deciphering the flight mission of the drone, it was established that it was aimed at a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol, was supposed to circle over the Novoazovsky district and hit the facility from the Taganrog Bay.

We see how Western terrorists, together with their Ukrainian accomplices, wanted to once again organize a monstrous terrorist attack and blame Russia for everything.

Against the backdrop of a major defeat of the Ukrainian armed forces in Avdiivka, the Kiev regime is making any attempts to destabilize the situation in the Republic. But thanks to the coordinated work of our special services, we were able to prevent a large-scale terrorist attack with casualties.

event: Delivery of Diesel Generator to 5th Tank Brigade
description: A 5-kilowatt diesel generator, crucial for powering communications, medical centers, and daily life, was delivered to the 5th tank brigade, the combat Buryats. The generator was purchased with funds from Ilya Gennadievich and others, with assistance from Vladimir Grubnik, 'Ghost of Novorossiya', who secured a discount from the manufacturer and facilitated fast delivery.
original:
Forwarded from: Mikhalych and everyone all everything
Diesel heartThe front around Donetsk is heavy, but it is moving. After the capture of Avdiivka, the units move, leave the familiar, settled PVD, PPU, oporniki and install new ones.
Often - in fields and forest plantations (in local language you should say “lesopolki”), in the middle of nowhere.

And here, among many others, electricity becomes the most important issue.
The generator becomes the heart of the unit. These are communications, light, control, saving lives in a medical center, these are batteries, copters, everyday life and much more.

Large stations are especially valuable - 5 kW and above. Diesel, since you need to buy gasoline, but there is diesel fuel.
They need care. In the right units they are cared for and cherished. Because a big generator is life.

Together, we transferred such a 5-kilowatt Diesel Heart to the fifth tank brigade, the combat Buryats.

Thank you very much to Ilya Gennadievich and everyone for the funds.

Special thanks to Vladimir Grubnik, “Ghost of Novorossiya”, for his help in purchasing an excellent generator, with a big discount from the manufacturer. And for the super-fast delivery of it to the unit.
This became possible thanks to the systematic work established in the “Ghost of Novorossiya”.

Warm greetings to everyone from the front.
Good luck to the warriors!
